thoughts.text: We have some good results from the 'google' command. Let's use the 'browse_website' command to explore one of the websites and get more information on the best places to travel in 2023.
thoughts.reasoning: We can use the 'browse_website' command to explore one of the websites returned by the 'google' command and get more information on the best places to travel in 2023.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for the best places to travel in 2023
- Choose one of the websites returned by the 'google' command
- Use the 'browse_website' command to explore the website and get more information
- Plan a trip to one of the recommended places
- Have fun exploring!
thoughts.criticism: I should have been more specific with the question when using the 'google' command.
